string.text: At last Wolf has sent help! Okay, listen, we’re going to knock bandits out of the factory, but the 2nd floor is ocupated by one prudent goggleeyed bastard and looks right into our direction. Silence won’t make any good there. Your task – to insensibly infiltrate the factory and give him a beat. As soon as we notice him missing, we’ll force our way in.
Clear. I’m gonna lay him down.
Maybe it would be better to attack the factory all together?
You chicken out, aren’t you? Me too, I’m not for so long in Zone as well, if you wanna stay alive it’s better not to show yourself. Vodka should be good here, for bravery.
Ah, I wish I had vodka now.
Perhaps you should visit merchant then? If you don’t want to make a silent assault.
Fine. I’ll be back soon.
I’ve got vodka, here take it.
Good… Well… hic… lets move out! Stay aside… don’t panic.
Íà÷èñòèì áàíäèòàì ðûëî!
I have to think about it, and look around… well, you understand. I’ll catch up with ya latter.
Well, have you thought it out? Able to take off that basterd from the 2nd floor? No other chances to approach, I think.
Got few questions.
Shoot, maybe you’ll sell me something on a way?
I think it’s enough.
Haven’t you heard about the Sniper?

I’ve once occurred to see the suit with &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Sniper grouping &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; inscription. Resolt with good benefits. If you see something like this, grab it to me.
How’s life? What are you doing?
Life sucks. No glimpse at all. Ïðèõîäèòñÿ âñÿêèì õëàìîì áàðûãîâàòü. Got anything to sell? Come on, I’ll pay worthy money.
Who is in charge in this camp?
Wolf. He’s there near the fire in stalker’s suit. I begged him to sell the suit for almost 20 times. That damn greedy doesn't want to.Íå õî÷åò, æëîá ìàõðîâûé.
Greetings. Can you sell anything?
Take dymanite. Now you’re free.
Yeah! I'll use the very single possibility to get a hell out of this zone, sell the bribe and go on vacation to the sea!
Can I set some questions?
Shoot.
Thanks, another time.
How did that Sniper manage to infiltrate the center of the Zone?
I don’t know. Barman must know about that. Maybe even in scientific camp they know this.
Who’s that Barman?
There is a stalker bar at &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Rostok&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; factory. He is in charge there. But the enterance is opened only for veterans.
Where is the Scientific camp?
Their base is situated on the dead Yantar lake.
My everyone is so eager to come to the center of Zone?
The majority wants to be rich – they hunt for artifacts. However there is something better than the amundance of the artifacts… Wishes executor much more expensive than any wealth.
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Wish executor &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;? What a hell is this?
I don’t have a clue. But it is there… I hope…
What prevents you from deeper penetration in the Zone?
Something burns out stalkers' brains to the north and prevents from breaking deeper into the zone.
What do you know about someone called Sniper?
I’ve heard obscure stories. He seemed to be gone few months ago, after infiltrating the center of Zone. His grouping has fallen to pieces and has been destroyed by someone… This is all I know.
Have you heard anything about Spectral stalker?
Wait a minute… I remember. He was one of the Sniper’s grouping. It is said that the whole grouping got into the ceter of Zone and only Spectral returned. But I don’t have a clue where he is now.
Well hi. ×å íàäî?
Hola. I was told that you’ve saved one of ours from the very death. Thank you. Take this artifact as the sign of our gratitude – you can exchange it at Merchant’s to the weapons, cartriges and food.
Got anything to do?

I’ve been here for too long. And I’m sick and tired of all that. Thought even about jerking. Planned everything, even how to get through those militaries. The only thing remaining is dynamite. My guys were bringing it to me, but bandits caught them and cleaned out. Now I have to return it. Bandits now settled near the factory, my boys are keeping watch over them now. So the point is – you bring the dynamite – I won’t stay in debt.
Fine, deal.
Deal. Be cautious.
No, you try to do it yourself.
You are a coward like anyone else.
There is nothing.

I’m feeling unwell. Just returned from the deep raid , almost reached the dead city, seen a lot of interesting. And when I was returning I run into the bloodsucker, barely escaped. Share medicine chest, if you got one.
Easily, take it, I don’t mean it.

Thanks for your help. Me and my workmate have dicovered a lot during this raid. Mate remained at the Dump to defend the bribe, and I decided to visit merchant quickly, to buy medicines, besides I had to deliver more info to him. So please hand this to the merchant
No, I can’t.
Tell me about that place.

This is the road to the Zone. One can find merchant in cellar near the army blockpost. But butting into the soldiers’ view won’t do any good, they are ordered to shoot everyone without warning… You can kill soldiers only at the worst, merchant has to pay per each killed and he won’t be satisfied with such course of events. The planes are overcrowded by blind dogs, if I were a new one I would stay away from that place. Even mutants can sometimes be seen here.
Thanks.
And what is along that way to the north?
There is the Dump. Gloomy place. Here to there you can’t even pass cos of the garbage.
Here is your artifact!
Well, thanks for assistance.
There is you case.
Weeeell, 1000 or not, 500 rubles and we’re done.
That stalker who returned wounded from the Zone handed over this package to you
Yeah, thanks.
What work have you got?
No, nothing yet.
Okay then. Anything else?
All as usual. First of all I need artifacts. I pay usual price not more, not less.\n Sometimes I need specail people for special work.
Really, everything is as usual. Okay – if I find something, I’ll try not to forget and bring it to you.
Maybe you’ve got a special work for a special person?

Need to bag an artifact. There is an accumulation of Elektra anomalies nearby, artifacts must be somewhere there. Bring any one to me – and we’re done. By the way if there will be no artifacts, just wait until someone traps into the anomaly, dog of human, doesn’t matter. Anomaly will make artifact out of him in a moment.
There is something else. You need to steal a case from the blockpost. But be careful. When they resent they make so much noise here, that even rats scatter.

There is one more thing to do. Barman from the stalker bar asked to find an “Agroprom” research institute document case. Although there is one BUT. Now the building is occupied by militaries. They are searching for something there.
Affirmative.
Right, I’ll try to do that imperceptibly.
Okay, I’m on it, just explain where to go.
No, I don’t want.
No, I don’t agree.
Sorry, I’m not ready for that.
Deal.

Well bring the case – then we’ll have a deal. But I want to outmark that if you start killing soldiers, I will anounce you to be outlawed. I don’t need infinites here. Ó íàñ òóò õðóïêèé ìèð îáðàçîâàëñÿ, ñîëäàòû êîíå÷íî âñå ðàâíî ïîñòðåëèâàþò ñòàëêåðîâ, íî êðóïíîãî ïðîòèâîñòîÿíèÿ íåò è åñòü êàíàëû êóäà ñáûâàòü õàáàð, åñëè êòî-òî íà÷íåò áó÷ó âðàç âñå èçìåíèòñÿ, à ìíå òàêîé ðàñêëàä ñîâñåì íå íðàâèòñÿ. Cheaper and faster will be to bring your head to blockpost commander. I hope you understand me right.
Go to the center of the Zone, through the Dump, then turn westward – agroprom is right there. When you reach agroprom, use your PDA to reach an institute. I’ve sent you coordinates.
You choose.
Well, as you want.
Come back when ready.

To make it short, Labelled, I’ve saved you and I won’t play dignified. Conduct some tasks for me and we’re done. Besides we’ll see how fast will your head restore from amnesia, and I’ll try to find about your case. A hell knows why do you need that Sniper, I don’t care of the outside problems. If you want to kill him, then there is for what.
well?
Now choose how shall I treat with you. Either I should wash newcomers’ brains or I’ll treat with you like with skilled stalker – received the task, carry out.
Let it be like with the newcomer.
Alright, have it your way. Listen then.
Better like with skilled, while it isn’t effaced from the memory.
Î! That’s how we do that. Listen then.
Hi! How’s life? I hope you are fine.\nGot a work for you on weekends.
Tell me about…
Ask, but I don’t know much. You understand, I sit here all the time and the whole life is outside.
Thanks, that’s it for today.
Tell me about the military stalkers.

Militaries as they are. Kind of presumptuous guys make themselves out to be gods. No respect for the customs, can't expect help from them, try as you might. Unless they shoot you not because of pity, because this is their nature – shoot first, them think. But I’ve found common with them. You understand what I mean.
What are the militaries doing in the Zone?

Protect, what else. Either the Zone or the world from the Zone, it is incomprehensible. Sometimes even military expeditions enter the zone. Searching for something, perhaps. Here what I can tell you. Militaries don’t respect the zone. Every now and then take away zinc coffins.
Tell me about the Zone.

It’s too dangerous in the zone without weapons… you can always buy some at mine at the cheapest… well, almost at… Zone’s center contains a klondike of artifacts for sure, the one who reaches it becomes wealthy. Do you see what I am driving at?
Can you answer several questions?
Sure.
Fine, thanks.
What do you know about the Sniper?

There was suc ha stalker but I haven’t seen him myself. Where did he come from and where did he go – it remains unclear. Rumors say that he made it to the center of the Zone. Try to find out more from stalkers.
What`s so interesting in the center of the Zone?
What a stupid question! In the center of the Zone there are tons of artifacts, the one who gets there, becomes very-very rich. Got my idea?
And how did Sniper get to the center of the Zone?
No idea. The Barmen of someone of veteran stalkers may know.
Who is Barman and where can I find him?
That’s my pal. He takes care of the Stalker bar on the factory. But only veterans are allowed there, so make no haste.
OK, thanks.
Always happy to help a client.
I need some equipment, where can I get it? Are there any stores nearby?
Well, you`re standing right inside one f them, buddy. Best staff best prices. Ammunition isn`t cheap, it`s pretty hard to get such things in the Zone.
I need some cash, how can I earn them?
Very simple. You render other people services, either they kill you, or they give you money. You can also sell me artifacts. I give good price, unlike those cheapjacks.
Spectral stalker. Heard something about him?\n\n*** After information about Spectral stalker was found on Agroprom ***

Ye, there was such a person, one of Sniper gang. They went together to the center of the Zone. When all guys died there, Spectral was the only survival. I too would like to know where he is. But no one has no information on his whereabouts.
Do you know stalker named Gray?\n\n*** After receiving Gray quest in the garage ***

Ye, he is a famous fellow, old-timer in the Zone. Brings exclusive artifacts, not some trinkets, but real staff, and brings them rather often. Grow pretty rich on it. I think he goes far deep into the Zone, maybe he even knows something about the Sniper.
Tell me about this place.

Suburbs of the Zone, military cordon. Troops of blind dogs wonder around. From time to time other mutants drop in. But in general it is usually calm and quite here, just military guys have fun sometimes. Stalkers only pass by, only freshmen linger on. No worthy loot here. What else, there is a demolished bridge and an abandoned factory. That`s all, I guess.
OK, thanks.
Tell me more about military blockpost.

Few dozens of soldiers, they are allowed to shoot on sight. So you better pass them by. When military guys are too worried, start calling help from special forces. Those fellows are really tough. After their visits I have no clients for months. So you better not to disturb them. I know their commander a little. He is a total drunkard. Only thanks to his I`m still here.
Tell me more about demolished bridge.

Further along the road inside the zone you'll find a railway embankment. It was once an expensive bridge, but had been destroyed during the surge. Militaries like to lie in wait for stalkers, returning with the bribe there.
Tell me more about the abandond factory.

When you cross the road you'll see it. White building. Things that could be stolen had been stolen long ago, everything else became rusty. The favourite bandits' place. There is a depression in the ground nearby that can provide one with artifacts.
Mate, help me with a medikit, I'm dying!
Sure, that's no question.
Thanks, mate! Talk to Wolf near the merchnt camp, you can be useful to him.
No, I ain't got any.
To talk to someone point sight at him and press ‘E’ button.
To activate PDA, press 'P' button.
To activate map press 'M'.
Find artifact in the place pointed on the map and bring it to the trader.
Search dead bodies, you may find some useful staff.
Remember! Helping wounded men, you help yourself.
Give this jerk a medkit.

Press Contact (Ñ). In and on minimap on the screen other stalkers with activated PDA will appear. Their attitude to you will also be stated on the screen. Be careful if you see enemies on the screen. However bandits and monsters usually don`t use PDA, so you better watch out in the Zone.
Watch out! Anomaly is near. Use screw-bolt to define their borders.
Watch out! Anomaly is near. Use screw-bolt to define their borders.
Hey, Labelled. There is a badly wounded stalker not far from you, he was coming back after a trip deep inside the Zone. Help him, he may know something about the Sniper.
Kill Sniper.
Find Sniper.
Find artifact.
Find your first artifact.
Help the wounded stalker.
Find the person who survived after the firing and help him.
Find and bring artifact from gravitational anomaly.
Trader needs any artifact from gravitational anomaly.
Find artifact. You can get it, if you lure someone into the anomaly.
Bring artifact to the merchant.
Help stalker.
Help wounded stalker, who is coming back from the raid.
Hand over the package to the merchant.
Hand over the package to the trader. It may help you.
Steal the case from blockpost.
Steal case with important documents from blockpost commander.
Steal the case from blockpost.
Bring case to the merchant.
Get dynamite for the Wolf.
Collect dynamite from the bandits on the factory and take it to the Wolf.
Find dynamite on the factory.
Bring dynamite to the Wolf.
Meet stalker on the Garbage.
Meet stalker in the garage on the Garbage and get information about Sniper`s clan.
Get military documents from “Agroprom” research institute.
Get military documents from “Agroprom” and deliver them to barman in Stalker bar.
Get military documents from “Agroprom” research institute.
Deliver the documents to barman in Stalker bar.
Meet Sniper's grouping.
You found out, that some stalkers gather on the abandoned factory near “Agroprom” institute. They may lead you to Sniper.
Find the hide of Sniper clan.
Find and search the hide of Sniper clan. There you may get information, where to find Sniper itself.
Hi!
See you!
Attention everyone… Cronies, don’t pry into the block post… Some jerks have attacked the patrol… All in all it’s really hot there… They’ll send dragoons for sure.

Recently courier Barman with the goods has been taken on the block post… All in all tasty morsel is the box with the artifacts, lies somewhere at commander’s… So, if the life bothers someone – one can risk.
Attention everyone. To the north from the bridge on the outpost, in about 100 meters over the forsaken APC stumbled on the gathering of “Electras”… Who finds this info useful owes me a beer.
People, the militaries have resumed the patrol under the broken bridge on the outpost. Their sniper has also hidden there… didn’t manage to find out where exactly – had to scarper from there…
Copy everyone… Bandits have settled at the factory again. Taking off bribes off the stalkers… Someone near there, intimidate those freaks… I won’t be in debt.
To the east form the bridge saw the pack of dogs on the outpost – about 20-30 men:)… So, make your conclusions, gentlemen…
Messrs stalkers… Need “Night star” promptly… I pay decent bread… It is said that there is one remaining on the outpost since the last emission…
…Vasya says that there is one labeled appeared, just left the merchant. You know what to do…
Somebody has shot Fedya Cherniy at the garage… Sense those bandits here again.

Don’t butt into the Black Valley, zombies are streaming from there, crowds of them… Don’t waste the bullets, damn. It’s been a long time since we had to clear the valley. What a hell is Duty looking at?
It seems that I’ve just seen several soldiers from Duty. I wonder, whom did they come for?
…I’m feeling badly, mates, it got me. If someone is near the rusty lake now, give a hand, I won’t stay in debt… All in all I’ll try to get out of here myself, then we’ll see.
Sniper returned! I’ve just heard from the ables… Returned from the very center! It seems that we’ll make a damn good breach to the center soon, there we’ll see who is who…
Three men settled in the garage… Be cautious, it seems that these convicts came again with the old.
I’m at the Dump, the place is crowded with blind dogs… It seems that new troops came from the center, be cautious everyone.
Show caution everyone. Militaries have established here for a long time. Their base is in institute building. I’ve seen several tens of people and sniper on the roof.
I’ve heard from the patrol conversations, that the militaries gather all they’ve found at the 2nd floor of the Institute’s building. If there are willing to risk for the gain – try to get through.
Bandit’s traditional outfit – leathern jacket with sewn Kevlar elements. Increases bullet splinter proof. Doesn’t protect from psi-influence.
Soldier’s standard ammunition set – light military body armour. Rather effective from the bullets and splinter. Doesn’t protect from pri-influence.

Stalker’s overalls produced by "artisans". Light army body armour plus plated amplifying kevlar elements. Rather effective against pistol bullets and splinters. Gummed tarpaulin is good against the radiation dust and weak anomalies. Doesn’t protect from psi-influence.

Stalker’s light overalls produced by "Freedom" grouping. Light army body armour plus plated amplifying kevlar elements. Rather effective against pistol bullets and splinters. Gummed tarpaulin is good against the radiation dust and weak anomalies. Doesn’t protect from psi-influence.

Stalker’s light overalls produced by "Hirelings" grouping. Samples of SWAT equipment of the western armies have been taken as the basis. Due to the special fabric treatment heatproof and antirad fabric properties have been improved. Average army body armour belonging to the suit amplified with the titanic elements. Rather effective against sub-machine gun bullets on medium and long distances. Due to the presence of the metallic gauze in the hood reduces psi-influence a bit.

Stalker’s amplified overalls produced by "Freedom" grouping. Average army body armour plus plated amplifying zirconium elements provide good defence against sub-machine gun bullets on medium and long distances. Suit material consists of two layers: specially treated fabric and fabric with asbestos thread. Good protection from radiation and weak anomalies. Due to the presence of the metallic gauze in the hood reduces psi-influence a bit.

Stalker’s amplified overalls produced by "Duty" grouping craftsmen. Average army body armour plus plated composite elements provide good defence against sub-machine gun bullets and splinters on medium and long distances. Suit material consists of two layers: specially treated leather and kevlar layer, that prevents animals from inflicting heavy damage. Good protection from radiation and weak anomalies. Due to the presence of the metallic gauze in the hood reduces psi-influence a bit.

Stalker’s overalls by "Monolith" grouping. Manufacturer unknown. Average army body armour plus plated kevlar elements give good protection against sub machine gun bullets and splinters on medium and long distances. Suit material consists of two layers. Specially treated fabric and a layer of special polyethylene. Great protection from radiation and weak anomalies. Stable to chemically aggressive environments. Due to the advanced metallic gauzes system and split rings greatly reduce psi-influence.

Modified army SWAT equipment for in-Zone work – Beryl-5M. Includes: average army body armour, double layered suit amplified by the titanic plates with beryllium covering and Shpere-08 helmet. Good defence from the sub machine gun bullets and splinters on medium and long distances. Average protection from radiation and anomalies. Good heatproof. Due to the presence of metallic helmet reduces psi-influence a bit.

Modified chemical defence suit for in-Zone activities SSP-98Ì. Used by scientific camps guard detachments. Integrated aerial compensation system, that allows to reduce the harm from falling overloads and from anomalies strikes. Built-in air filtering and conditioner systems. Stable to the chemically aggressive environments. Great protection from the radiation. Good heatproof. Average defence from bullets and splinters. Due to the presence of directed electricity neutralization system greatly reduces pri-influence.

Modified chemical defence suit for in-Zone activities SSP-99Ì. Used in scientific expeditions and cooperating stalkers-ecologists. Built-in aerial compensation system, that allows to reduce the harm from falling overloads and anomalies strikes. Integrated air filtering and conditioning system. Great protection from radiation and biological anomalies. Stable to chemically aggressive environments. Good heatproof. Average defence from bullets and splinters. Due to the direct fields neutralization system greatly reduces psi-influence.

Experimental sample of military exo-skeleton. Manufacturer – some foreign military research center, interested in running in his “child” in hard Zone conditions. Heavy hydraulic equipment, attached to the back nevertheless allows to transport more weight and get less tired. Hydraulics allow to reduce the harm from falling overloads and from anomalies strikes. Gear system plays a defensive role for the body from the bullets and splinters. Worn on the suit.

Created specially to work in Zone conditions, army stalkers equipment set - SCAT-9. Includes: heavy army body armour, built-in compensation suit, double layered (strengthened kevlar, polyethylene) suit amplified by titanic plates with beryllium covering and Sphere-12 covering. Great defence from sub-machine gun bullets and splinters. Amplified defence characteristics against explosion, falling and gravity strikes. Good defence from radiation and anomalies. Good heatproof. Quite good chemically aggressive environments stableness. Due to the presence of the metallic helmet with the system of metallic gauzes and split rings reduces psi-influence.

Specially created for in-Zone activities, army stalker-commander equipment set -SCAT-9Ì. Includes: heavy army body armour, built-in compensation suit, double layered (strengthened kevlar, polyethylene) suit amplified by titanic plates with beryllium covering and Sphere-12 covering. Great defence from sub-machine gun bullets and splinters. Amplified defence characteristics against explosion, falling and gravity strikes. Good defence from radiation and anomalies. Good heatproof. Quite good chemically aggressive environments stableness. Due to the presence of the metallic helmet with the system of metallic gauzes and split rings is good at reducing psi-influence..

Stalker environmental suit of the highest defence. Stalker master or grouping leader equipment. Manufactured and selled underground by one of the defensive Kiev scientific research institute. Very expensive, thus wasn’t added to the armoury of army stalkers. Includes: diverse armouring on the vital important body parts, built-in compensation suit, integrated air filtering and conditioning system, helmet from the suit of the highest chemical defence suit with the complicated system of psi-influence neutralization. Great defence against the sub-machine gun bullets and splinters. Improved defence characteristics from explosions, fallings and gravity strikes. Great defence from radiation and anomalies. Good heatproof. Perfectly stable to the chemically aggressive environments.
